oai_dc:dc.dc:title: der Vogelfanger: HYBRIDIZING BIRDS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Griffith, Joseph G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aviaries and cages are the mechanicalmeans we use for containing and breedingbirds. From this standpoint, the first keyto breeding success is EFFICIENCY.Every cage and every aviary should bedesigned so that it can be serviced fromthe outside.Consider the time it takes to carry anumber of buckets into each aviary,opening each door, checking feed, etc.Compare this with pushing a cart down arow filling hoppers and trays as you go.Cages are even worse. You must open thedoor, remove the dish, close the door,fill the dish, open the door, put in thedish and finally close the door. For eachdish!
